metadata.title: CVE-2017-13728 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - negligible.
metadata.description: There is an infinite loop in the next_char function in comp_scan.c in ncurses 6.0, related to libtic. A crafted input will lead to a remote denial of service attack.

criterions.comment: ncurses package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.1-1ubuntu1').
